name: aiops-learning-platform
description: AIOps Learning Platform - Gamified DevOps Education System

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:tests
scripts.install:services: npm install --workspace=services/user-service && npm install --workspace=services/submission-service && npm install --workspace=services/gamification-service && npm install --workspace=services/feedback-service && npm install --workspace=services/analytics-service
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:services: npm run build --workspace=services/user-service && npm run build --workspace=services/submission-service && npm run build --workspace=services/gamification-service && npm run build --workspace=services/feedback-service && npm run build --workspace=services/analytics-service
scripts.test: npm run test:services && npm run test:integration
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=services/user-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/submission-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/gamification-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/feedback-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/analytics-service"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=services/user-service && npm run lint --workspace=services/submission-service && npm run lint --workspace=services/gamification-service && npm run lint --workspace=services/feedback-service && npm run lint --workspace=services/analytics-service && npm run lint --workspace=frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:services && npm run clean:frontend

author: AIOps Learning Platform Team
